item.title: Projecting Tuesday's penultimate CFP top 12
item.description: We assess how the committee could stack the top teams in the country after Week 14.

item.title: Best of Rivalry Week: Saturday's results offered a healthy dose of certainty
item.description: The final chapter of the 2025 regular season didn't upend the status quo, but it did give us plenty of answers.

item.title: Survivor Series WarGames: Who is the masked man who attacked CM Punk?
item.description: The men's WarGames match was interrupted by a mystery man, and the theories are already flying.

item.title: Sources: LSU expected to hire Kiffin on Sunday
item.description: Sources told ESPN late Saturday that the expectation is LSU, a day after its regular season ended, will hire Ole Miss coach Lane Kiffin, 50, on Sunday...

item.title: Bama wins Iron Bowl, to face Georgia for SEC title
item.description: No. 10 Alabama escaped Auburn with a 27-20 victory and will face No. 4 Georgia in the Southeastern Conference championship game next week in Atlanta.
